Name: Removal of postings of temporary parking changes.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to removal of postings of temporary parking changes.
Text:
Int. No. 4
 
By Council Members Dromm, Constantinides, Koo, Palma, Williams and Mendez 

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to removal of postings of temporary parking changes.
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Section 19-175.2 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to add a new subdivision f to read as follows:
      f. 	All postings of temporary parking restrictions required by this section or otherwise posted by the police department or any other agency shall be removed by the entity that placed such posting not more than twenty four hours following the conclusion of the temporary parking restrictions.  
      ï¿½2.  	This local law shall take effect immediately upon enactment.


LF
LS#5210
1/13/14

\pard\cbpat1\ltrpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1 Section 1. Section 19-175.2 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to add a new subdivision f to read as follows:\par
\ul f. \ulnone\tab\ul All postings of temporary parking restrictions required by this section or otherwise posted by the police department or any other agency shall be removed by the entity that placed such posting not more than twenty four hours following the conclusion of the temporary parking restrictions.  \par
\ulnone\'a72.  \tab This local law shall take effect immediately upon enactment.\par
